name: Blither
description:
Blither is a simple capture and territory game for two players.

Turns are simple: MOVE a piece, then PLACE a piece.

Capture by surrounding one of each of your opponent's piece types (or a group of pieces of the same type) to win the game!

The app features:
- play against AI or human opponents (on the same device)
- play a custom game on larger or smaller boards
- multiple win condition (play "high score mode" for a different experience!)
- the app supports dark mode via your system settings (or you can choose from the options screen)
- saves various statistics
